mapper.insert: insert into tb_category (category_id, category_name, parent_id, level, is_delete, sort, status, create_time, create_id, update_time, update_id, bak1, bak2, bak3) values (#{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bak1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bak2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bak3,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.select: select category_id, category_name, parent_id, level, is_delete, sort, status, create_time, create_id, update_time, update_id, bak1, bak2, bak3 from tb_category where category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
